name: Tranquility VR Meditation
description:
Tranquility is a prototype experiment in which the user can experience guided or unguided meditation in a Japanese style garden.

As this project is a prototype and in the early stage of development, the fate of this project is currently unknown, and may have bugs.
It is planned to have more than one music track and guided meditations as well as a few more different areas for users to explore or meditate in

Currently tested on the HTC Vive:
Soon to be tested: Oculus Rift, 
Currently untested on other pcvr devices. If you find any bugs on any devices, feel free to contact me about it and I shall see what I can do about fixing it.
